00316 //
00317 // Fonctions de calcul des flux pour une grandeur scalaire
00318 //
00319 
00320 ////!< flux_face avec Dirichlet_entree_fluide 
00321 //
00322 
00323 inline double Eval_centre_VDF_Elem::flux_face(const DoubleTab& inco, int face,
00324                                               const Dirichlet_entree_fluide& la_cl,
00325                                               int num1) const
00326 {
00327   int n0 = elem_(face,0);
00328   int n1 = elem_(face,1);
00329   double flux;
00330   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
00331   double T_imp = la_cl.val_imp(face-num1);
00332   if (n0 != -1)
00333     {
00334       if (psc > 0)
00335         flux= psc*inco[n0];
00336       else
00337         flux= psc*T_imp;
00338     }
00339   else   //!< n1 != -1
00340     {
00341       if (psc>0)
00342         flux= psc*T_imp;
00343       else
00344         flux= psc*inco[n1];
00345     }
00346   return -flux;
00347 }
00348 
00349 ////!< coeffs_face avec Dirichlet_entree_fluide 
00350 //
00351 
00352 inline void Eval_centre_VDF_Elem::coeffs_face(int face, int num1,const Dirichlet_entree_fluide& la_cl,
00353                                               double& aii, double& ajj) const
00354 {
00355   int i = elem_(face,0);
00356 // int j = elem(face,1);
00357   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface[face]*porosite[face];
00358 
00359   if (i != -1)
00360     {
00361       if (psc > 0)
00362         aii = -psc;
00363     }
00364   else   //!< j != -1
00365     {
00366       if (psc<0)
00367         ajj = -psc;
00368     }
00369 }
00370 
00371 inline double Eval_centre_VDF_Elem::coeffs_face_bloc_vitesse(const DoubleTab& inco, int face,
00372                                                              const Dirichlet_entree_fluide& la_cl,
00373                                                              int num1) const
00374 {
00375   int n0 = elem_(face,0);
00376   int n1 = elem_(face,1);
00377   double flux;
00378   double psc = surface(face)*porosite(face);
00379   double T_imp = la_cl.val_imp(face-num1);
00380   if (n0 != -1)
00381     {
00382       if (dt_vitesse[face] > 0)
00383         flux= psc*inco[n0];
00384       else
00385         flux= psc*T_imp;
00386     }
00387   else   //!< n1 != -1
00388     {
00389       if (dt_vitesse[face]>0)
00390         flux= psc*T_imp;
00391       else
00392         flux= psc*inco[n1];
00393     }
00394   return flux;
00395 }
00396 
00397 
00398 ////!< secmem_face avec Dirichlet_entree_fluide 
00399 //
00400 
00401 inline double Eval_centre_VDF_Elem::secmem_face(int face, const Dirichlet_entree_fluide& la_cl,
00402                                                 int num1) const
00403 {
00404   int i = elem_(face,0);
00405 // int j = elem(face,1);
00406   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface[face]*porosite[face];
00407   double flux=0;
00408   double T_imp = la_cl.val_imp(face-num1);
00409   if (i != -1)
00410     {
00411       if (psc < 0)
00412         flux = psc*T_imp;
00413     }
00414   else   //!< j != -1
00415     {
00416       if (psc>0)
00417         flux = psc*T_imp;
00418     }
00419   return -flux;
00420 }

00610 ////!< flux_face avec Neumann_sortie_libre 
00611 //
00612 
00613 inline double Eval_centre_VDF_Elem::flux_face(const DoubleTab& inco, int face,
00614                                               const Neumann_sortie_libre& la_cl, int num1) const
00615 {
00616   int n0 = elem_(face,0);
00617   int n1 = elem_(face,1);
00618   double flux;
00619   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
00620   if (n0 != -1)
00621     {
00622       if (psc > 0)
00623         flux= psc*inco[n0];
00624       else
00625         flux= psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1);
00626     }
00627   else   //!< n1 != -1
00628     {
00629       if (psc > 0)
00630         flux=psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1);
00631       else
00632         flux= psc*inco[n1];
00633     }
00634   return -flux;
00635 }
00636 
00637 ////!< coeffs_face avec Neumann_sortie_libre 
00638 //
00639 
00640 inline void Eval_centre_VDF_Elem::coeffs_face(int face,int num1, const Neumann_sortie_libre& la_cl,
00641                                               double& aii, double& ajj) const
00642 {
00643   int i = elem_(face,0);
00644 // int j = elem(face,1);
00645   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
00646   if (i != -1)
00647     {
00648       if (psc > 0)
00649         aii = -psc;
00650     }
00651   else   //!< n1 != -1
00652     {
00653       if (psc < 0)
00654         ajj = -psc;
00655     }
00656 }
00657 
00658 inline double Eval_centre_VDF_Elem::coeffs_face_bloc_vitesse(const DoubleTab& inco, int face,
00659                                                              const Neumann_sortie_libre& la_cl, int num1) const
00660 {
00661   int n0 = elem_(face,0);
00662   int n1 = elem_(face,1);
00663   double flux;
00664   double psc = surface(face)*porosite(face);
00665   if (n0 != -1)
00666     {
00667       if (dt_vitesse[face] > 0)
00668         flux= psc*inco[n0];
00669       else
00670         flux= psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1);
00671     }
00672   else   //!< n1 != -1
00673     {
00674       if (dt_vitesse[face] > 0)
00675         flux=psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1);
00676       else
00677         flux= psc*inco[n1];
00678     }
00679   return flux;
00680 }
00681 
00682 
00683 ////!< secmem_face avec Neumann_sortie_libre 
00684 //
00685 
00686 inline double Eval_centre_VDF_Elem::secmem_face(int face, const Neumann_sortie_libre& la_cl, int num1) const
00687 {
00688   double flux=0;
00689   int i = elem_(face,0);
00690 // int j = elem(face,1);
00691   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
00692   if (i != -1)
00693     {
00694       if (psc < 0)
00695         flux = psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1);
00696     }
00697   else   //!< j != -1
00698     {
00699       if (psc > 0)
00700         flux = psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1);
00701     }
00702   return -flux;
00703 }

00769 ////!< flux_face avec Periodique 
00770 //
00771 
00772 inline double Eval_centre_VDF_Elem::flux_face(const DoubleTab& inco, int face,
00773                                               const Periodique& la_cl, int ) const
00774 {
00775 // 30/05/2002 : Codage Periodicite.
00776 // ALEX C.
00777   double flux;
00778   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
00779   int n0 = elem_(face,0);
00780   int n1 = elem_(face,1);
00781   int n0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
00782   int n1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
00783 
00784 // on applique le schema centre2
00785   flux = qcentre(psc,n0,n1,n0_0,n1_1,face,inco);
00786   return -flux;
00787 }
00788 
00789 ////!< coeffs_face avec Periodique 
00790 //
00791 inline void Eval_centre_VDF_Elem::coeffs_face(int face, int,const Periodique& la_cl, double& aii, double& ajj) const
00792 {
00793 // 30/05/2002 : Codage Periodicite.
00794 // // ALEX C.
00795   int i = elem_(face,0);
00796   int j = elem_(face,1);
00797   int i0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
00798   int j1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
00799   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface[face]*porosite[face];
00800 
00801 // on applique le schema centre
00802   if (psc > 0)
00803     aii = -qcentre(psc,i,j,i0_0,j1_1,face,inconnue->valeurs());
00804   else
00805     ajj = -qcentre(psc,i,j,i0_0,j1_1,face,inconnue->valeurs());
00806 }
00807 
00808 inline double Eval_centre_VDF_Elem::coeffs_face_bloc_vitesse(const DoubleTab& inco, int face,
00809                                                              const Periodique& la_cl, int ) const
00810 {
00811 // 30/05/2002 : Codage Periodicite.
00812 // ALEX C.
00813   double flux;
00814   double psc = surface(face)*porosite(face);
00815   int n0 = elem_(face,0);
00816   int n1 = elem_(face,1);
00817   int n0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
00818   int n1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
00819 
00820 // on applique le schema centre2
00821   flux = qcentre(psc,n0,n1,n0_0,n1_1,face,inco);
00822   return flux;
00823 }
00824 
00825 ////!< secmem_face avec Periodique 
00826 //
00827 
00828 inline double Eval_centre_VDF_Elem::secmem_face(int, const Periodique&, int ) const
00829 {
00830   return 0;
00831 }
00832 
00833 ////!< flux_faces_interne 
00834 //
00835 
00836 inline double Eval_centre_VDF_Elem::flux_faces_interne(const DoubleTab& inco, int face) const
00837 {
00838   double flux;
00839   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
00840   int n0 = elem_(face,0);
00841   int n1 = elem_(face,1);
00842   int n0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
00843   int n1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
00844 
00845   flux = qcentre(psc,n0,n1,n0_0,n1_1,face,inco);
00846   return -flux;
00847 }
00848 
00849 ////!< coeffs_faces_interne 
00850 //
00851 
00852 inline void Eval_centre_VDF_Elem::coeffs_faces_interne(int face, double& aii, double& ajj ) const
00853 {
00854   int i = elem_(face,0);
00855   int j = elem_(face,1);
00856   int i0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
00857   int j1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
00858   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface[face]*porosite[face];
00859 
00860   if ( (i0_0 == -1) || (j1_1 == -1) ) //!< on applique le schema amont
00861     if (psc > 0)
00862       aii = -psc;
00863     else
00864       ajj = -psc;
00865 
00866   else  //!< on applique le schema centre
00867     if (psc > 0)
00868       aii = -qcentre(psc,i,j,i0_0,j1_1,face,inconnue->valeurs());
00869     else
00870       ajj = -qcentre(psc,i,j,i0_0,j1_1,face,inconnue->valeurs());
00871 }
00872 
00873 inline double Eval_centre_VDF_Elem::coeffs_faces_interne_bloc_vitesse(const DoubleTab& inco, int face) const
00874 {
00875   double flux;
00876   double psc = surface(face)*porosite(face);
00877   int n0 = elem_(face,0);
00878   int n1 = elem_(face,1);
00879   int n0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
00880   int n1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
00881 
00882   flux = qcentre(psc,n0,n1,n0_0,n1_1,face,inco);
00883   return flux;
00884 }
00885 
00886 ////!< secmem_faces_interne 
00887 //
00888 
00889 inline double Eval_centre_VDF_Elem::secmem_faces_interne(int) const
00890 {
00891   return 0;
00892 }
00893 
00894 
00895 //
00896 // Fonctions de calcul des flux pour une grandeur vectorielle
00897 //
00898 
00899 ////!< flux_face avec Dirichlet_entree_fluide 
00900 //
00901 
00902 inline void Eval_centre_VDF_Elem::flux_face(const DoubleTab& inco, int face,
00903                                             const Dirichlet_entree_fluide& la_cl,
00904                                             int num1, DoubleVect& flux) const
00905 {
00906   int k;
00907   int n0 = elem_(face,0);
00908   int n1 = elem_(face,1);
00909   double psc = dt_vitesse(face)*surface(face)*porosite(face);
00910 
00911   if (n0 != -1)
00912     {
00913       if (psc > 0)
00914         for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00915           flux(k) = -psc*inco(n0,k);
00916       else
00917         for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00918           flux(k)= -psc*la_cl.val_imp(face-num1,k);
00919     }
00920   else //!< n1 != -1
00921     {
00922       if (psc>0)
00923         for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00924           flux(k)= -psc*la_cl.val_imp(face-num1,k);
00925       else
00926         for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00927           flux(k)= -psc*inco(n1,k);
00928     }
00929 }
00930 
00931 ////!< coeffs_face avec Dirichlet_entree_fluide 
00932 //
00933 
00934 inline void Eval_centre_VDF_Elem::coeffs_face(int face, int num1,const Dirichlet_entree_fluide& la_cl,
00935                                               DoubleVect& aii, DoubleVect& ajj) const
00936 {
00937   int k;
00938   int i = elem_(face,0);
00939 // int j = elem(face,1);
00940   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
00941   if (i != -1)
00942     {
00943       if (psc > 0)
00944         for(k=0; k<aii.size(); k++)
00945           aii(k) = -psc;
00946     }
00947   else   //!< j != -1
00948     {
00949       if (psc < 0)
00950         for(k=0; k<ajj.size(); k++)
00951           ajj(k) = -psc;
00952     }
00953 }
00954 
00955 ////!< secmem_face avec Dirichlet_entree_fluide 
00956 //
00957 
00958 inline void Eval_centre_VDF_Elem::secmem_face(int face, const Dirichlet_entree_fluide& la_cl, int num1, DoubleVect& flux) const
00959 {
00960   int k;
00961   int i = elem_(face,0);
00962 // int j = elem(face,1);
00963   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
00964   if (i != -1)
00965     {
00966       if (psc < 0)
00967         for(k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00968           flux(k) = -psc*la_cl.val_imp(face-num1);
00969     }
00970   else   //!< j != -1
00971     {
00972       if (psc > 0)
00973         for(k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00974           flux(k) = -psc*la_cl.val_imp(face-num1);
00975     }
00976 }

01140 ////!< flux_face avec Neumann_sortie_libre 
01141 //
01142 
01143 inline void Eval_centre_VDF_Elem::flux_face(const DoubleTab& inco, int face,
01144                                             const Neumann_sortie_libre& la_cl,
01145                                             int num1, DoubleVect& flux) const
01146 {
01147   int k;
01148   int n0 = elem_(face,0);
01149   int n1 = elem_(face,1);
01150   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
01151   if (n0 != -1)
01152     {
01153       if (psc > 0)
01154         for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
01155           flux(k) = -psc*inco(n0,k);
01156       else
01157         for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
01158           flux(k) = -psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1,k);
01159     }
01160   else  //!< n1 != -1
01161     {
01162       if (psc > 0)
01163         for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
01164           flux(k) = -psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1,k);
01165       else
01166         for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
01167           flux(k) = -psc*inco(n1,k);
01168     }
01169 }
01170 
01171 ////!< coeffs_face avec Neumann_sortie_libre 
01172 //
01173 
01174 inline void Eval_centre_VDF_Elem::coeffs_face(int face,int num1, const Neumann_sortie_libre& la_cl,
01175                                               DoubleVect& aii, DoubleVect& ajj) const
01176 {
01177   int k;
01178   int i = elem_(face,0);
01179 // int j = elem(face,1);
01180   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
01181   if (i != -1)
01182     {
01183       if (psc > 0)
01184         for(k=0; k<aii.size(); k++)
01185           aii(k) = -psc;
01186     }
01187   else   //!< n1 != -1
01188     {
01189       if (psc < 0)
01190         for(k=0; k<ajj.size(); k++)
01191           ajj(k) = -psc;
01192     }
01193 }
01194 
01195 ////!< secmem_face avec Neumann_sortie_libre 
01196 //
01197 
01198 inline void Eval_centre_VDF_Elem::secmem_face(int face, const Neumann_sortie_libre& la_cl, int num1, DoubleVect& flux) const
01199 {
01200   int k;
01201   int i = elem_(face,0);
01202 // int j = elem(face,1);
01203   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
01204   if (i != -1)
01205     {
01206       if (psc < 0)
01207         for(k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
01208           flux(k) = -psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1);
01209     }
01210   else   //!< j != -1
01211     {
01212       if (psc > 0)
01213         for(k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
01214           flux(k) = -psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1);
01215     }
01216 }

01273 ////!< flux_face avec Periodique 
01274 //
01275 
01276 inline void Eval_centre_VDF_Elem::flux_face(const DoubleTab& inco, int face,
01277                                             const Periodique& la_cl,
01278                                             int, DoubleVect& flux) const
01279 {
01280   int k;
01281   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
01282   int n0 = elem_(face,0);
01283   int n1 = elem_(face,1);
01284   int n0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
01285   int n1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
01286 
01287 // on applique le schema centre
01288   qcentre(psc,n0,n1,n0_0,n1_1,face,inco,flux);
01289   for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
01290     flux(k) *= -1;
01291 
01292 }
01293 
01294 ////!< coeffs_face avec Periodique 
01295 //
01296 
01297 inline void Eval_centre_VDF_Elem::coeffs_face(int face,int, const Periodique& la_cl,
01298                                               DoubleVect& aii, DoubleVect& ajj) const
01299 {
01300   int k;
01301   int i = elem_(face,0);
01302   int j = elem_(face,1);
01303   int i0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
01304   int j1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
01305   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface[face]*porosite[face];
01306   ArrOfDouble flux(aii.size());
01307 
01308 // on applique le schema centre2
01309   qcentre(psc,i,j,i0_0,j1_1,face,inconnue->valeurs(),flux);
01310   if (psc > 0)
01311     for (k=0; k<aii.size(); k++)
01312       aii(k) = -flux(k);
01313   else
01314     for (k=0; k<ajj.size(); k++)
01315       ajj(k) = -flux(k);
01316 }

01336   int n1 = elem_(face,1);

01369   /*     if (psc > 0) */

01397 ////!< Fram4 
01398 //
01399 
01400 /* inline double Fram4(const double& s1,const double& s2, */
01401 /*                    const double& s3,const double& s4) */
01402 /* { */
01403 /*   double smin0 = dmin(s4,s2); */
01404 /*   double smax0 = dmax(s4,s2); */
01405 /*   double smin1 = dmin(s3,s1); */
01406 /*   double smax1 = dmax(s3,s1); */
01407 /*   double sr0 = (s3-smin0)/(smax0-smin0+DMINFLOAT); */
01408 /*   double sr1 = (s2-smin1)/(smax1-smin1+DMINFLOAT); */
01409 /*   double fr = 2.*dmax(dabs(sr0-0.5),dabs(sr1-0.5)); */
01410 /*   fr *= fr; */
01411 /*   fr *= fr; */
01412 /*   return dmin(fr,1.0); */
01413 /* } */

01425 ////!< qcentre pour un champ transporte scalaire 
01426 //
01427 
01428 inline double Eval_centre_VDF_Elem::qcentre(const double& psc, const int num0, const int num1,
01429                                             const int num0_0, const int num1_1, const int face,
01430                                             const DoubleTab& transporte) const
01431 {
01432   double flux;
01433 // int ori = orientation(face);
01434 
01435   double T0 = transporte[num0];
01436   double T1 = transporte[num1];
01437 
01438 
01439   flux =  0.5*(T0+T1);
01440 
01441 
01442 // On applique le filtre Fram4:
01443 
01444 // fr = Fram4(T0_0,T0,T1,T1_1);
01445 // flux = ((1.-fr)*flux + fr*trans_amont)*psc;
01446 
01447   return flux*psc;
01448 }
01449 
01450 
01451 ////!< qcentre pour un champ transporte vectoriel 
01452 //
01453 
01454 inline void Eval_centre_VDF_Elem::qcentre(const double& psc, const int num0, const int num1,
01455                                           const int num0_0, const int num1_1, const int face,
01456                                           const DoubleTab& transporte,ArrOfDouble& flux) const
01457 {
01458 
01459   int k;
01460   int ncomp = flux.size_array();
01461 
01462 // int ori = orientation(face);
01463 // double dx = dist_elem(num0, num1, ori);
01464 // double dxam=dist_elem(num0_0, num0, ori);
01465 // double dxav=dist_elem(num1, num1_1, ori);
01466 
01467   ArrOfDouble T0(ncomp);
01468   ArrOfDouble T1(ncomp);
01469 
01470   for (k=0; k<ncomp; k++)
01471     {
01472       T0(k) = transporte(num0,k);
01473       T1(k) = transporte(num1,k);
01474     }
01475 
01476 // double g1 = -dx*dx*(dx/2+dxav)/(4*(dx+dxam+dxav)*(dx+dxam)*dxam);
01477 // double g2 =  (dx+2*dxam)*(dx+2*dxav)/(8*dxam*(dx+dxav));
01478 // double g3 = (dx+2*dxam)*(dx+2*dxav)/(8*dxav*(dx+dxam));
01479 // double g4 = -dx*dx*(dx/2+dxam)/(4*(dx+dxam+dxav)*dxav*(dx+dxav));
01480 
01481   for (k=0; k<ncomp; k++)
01482     {
01483       flux(k) =0.5*(  T0(k) + T1(k))   *   psc ;
01484     }
01485 
01486 // On applique le filtre Fram4:
01487 
01488 // for (k=0; k<ncomp; k++)
01489 // {
01490 // fr = Fram4(T0_0(k),T0(k),T1(k),T1_1(k));
01491 // flux(k) = ((1.-fr)*flux(k) + fr*trans_amont(k))*psc;
01492 }
